thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 13 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 4:55 PM, 15 June 2025(Sunday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Tarlac, Pampanga, Bataan and Laguna within the next 2 hours.



Intense to torrential rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are being experienced in Bulacan(San Miguel, San Ildefonso, San Rafael, Dona Remedios Trinidad, Baliuag, Bustos, Angat, Pulilan, San Jose del Monte), Rizal(Rodriguez), Metro Manila(Caloocan, Quezon City, Valenzuela), Cavite(Maragondon, Magallanes, General Emilio Aguinaldo, Ternate, Tanza, Naic, Trece Martires, General Trias, Alfonso, Tagaytay), Batangas(Laurel), Nueva Ecija(Cabanatuan, Santa Rosa, San Leonardo, Jaen, Penaranda), Zambales(Botolan, San Marcelino) and Quezon(Tayabas, Pagbilao, Mauban, Lucban, Sampaloc) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
